alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chickasaw, northeastern Calhoun and southern Pontotoc Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Houlka, or 11 miles northwest of Houston, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pontotoc, Vardaman, Pyland, Troy, Houlka, Randolph, Thaxton, New Houlka, Algoma, Robbs, Thorn, Chiwapa, Reid, Loyd, Pannell, Thelma, Tabbville, Matthews, Wallfield and George P Cossar State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
